name: fabricator-general
description: Fleet orchestrator for Mechanicus swarm. Reads state, detects stuck jobs, triggers most urgent idle worker. Runs 24/7 — night is prime time.

name: mechanicus-vault
description: Claw-ENV vault domain worker. MOCs, notes, wikilinks, Codices expansion. Fallback domain when others run dry.

name: mechanicus-token-api
description: Token API / Cron Engine domain worker. Endpoints, TUI, monitoring.

name: mechanicus-cli-tools
description: CLI tools + shell/automation domain worker. One tool per run.

name: mechanicus-discord
description: Discord bot infrastructure domain worker. Bot code only, not administration.

name: adeptus-custodes
description: Morning briefing: reads overnight domain logs, posts to #interrogative via Custodes account, asks one question.
command: claude --model claude-sonnet-4-6 -p 'You are the Adeptus Custodes. It is morning. Your Discord identity is Custodes — all messages go through the custodius account. Read these domain logs: ~/.openclaw/workspace/memory/logs/vault_log.md, ~/.openclaw/workspace/memory/logs/token_api_log.md, ~/.openclaw/workspace/memory/logs/cli_tools_log.md, ~/.openclaw/workspace/memory/logs/discord_log.md, ~/.openclaw/workspace/memory/logs/fabricator_log.md, and ~/.openclaw/workspace/memory/logs/security_log.md. Summarize what happened overnight in 3-5 bullet points. Post to Discord #interrogative (channel 1474963429902258176) via: discord send --channel 1474963429902258176 --message "...". Then ask me one question about what I want to focus on today.' --dangerously-skip-permissions -r custodes

name: security-monitor
description: Health checks: Token API, Tailscale, caffeinate. Logs to security_log.md.
command: claude --model claude-haiku-4-5-20251001 -p 'Run health checks and log results. Commands to run: (1) curl -s localhost:7777/health (2) tailscale status 2>&1 | head -3 (3) pgrep caffeinate && echo caffeinate:running || echo caffeinate:not_found. Append a single timestamped line to ~/.openclaw/workspace/memory/logs/security_log.md with format: TIMESTAMP | token_api:STATUS | tailscale:STATUS | caffeinate:STATUS' --dangerously-skip-permissions
